tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TravelItinerary (
  itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_details TEXT,
  accommodation_bookings TEXT,
  sightseeing_plans TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE flight_details (
    flight_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_date DATE,
    airline_name VARCHAR(50),
    departure_airport VARCHAR(50),
    destination_airport VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE accommodation_bookings (
    booking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    hotel_name VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE flight_details (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_number VARCHAR(20),
  departure_airport VARCHAR(50),
  arrival_airport VARCHAR(50),
  departure_date DATE,
  arrival_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE accommodation_bookings (
  booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hotel_name VARCHAR(50),
  check_in_date DATE,
  check_out_date DATE,
  booking_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_number VARCHAR(50),
  departure_city VARCHAR(100),
  arrival_city VARCHAR(100),
  departure_date DATE,
  arrival_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
  accommodation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accommodation_name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  check_in_date DATE,
  check_out_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sightseeing (
  sightseeing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sightseeing_name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  visit_date DATE,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE travel_itinerary (
  itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  digital_nomad_id INT,
  flight_id INT,
  accommodation_id INT,
  sightseeing_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE flight_details (
  flight_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_date DATE,
  airline VARCHAR(50),
  departure_city VARCHAR(50),
  arrival_city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE accommodation_bookings (
  booking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  check_in_date DATE,
  check_out_date DATE,
  hotel_name VARCHAR(100),
  room_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE nomad_info (
  nomad_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(100),
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE trip_itinerary (
  itinerary_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  nomad_id INT,
  flight_id INT,
  booking_id INT,
  plan_id INT
);
